title: The temple of death a poem / written by the Marquess of Normanby ...
author: Habert, Philippe, 1605-1637.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Warren for Francis Saunders ...,
notes: Translation of Habert's Le temple de la mort.
John Sheffield was the Marquis of Normanby, later Duke of Buckingham and Normanby--Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
(from t.p.) Horace, of the Art of poetry / made English by the Earl of Roscommon -- The duel of the stags / by the Honourable Sir Robert Howard.
